ygData.msgSnippet: ... Zardus looks at Panzertron, sizing him up. He nods. Yes, he ll be ariving shortly. Zardus activates his comm-link, Delta, land and decloak, he says

::Zardus::

Zardus looks at Panzertron, sizing him up. He nods. "Yes, he'll be ariving 
shortly."

Zardus activates his comm-link, "Delta, land and decloak," he says into it, 
then looks at Panzertron.

"Nice ship," he says, "Are we going to the bridge?"
